Spouse self-emp. or works for somebody

Source: R/gss_vars_05.R
spwrkslf.Rd

spwrkslf

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question A. What kind of work (does/did) your (SPOUSE) normally do? That is, what (is/was) (his/her) job called? OCCUPATION: (See REMARKS) B. What (does/did) (SPOUSE) actually do in that job? Tell me, what (are/were) some of (his/her) main duties? C. What kind of place (does/did) (SPOUSE) work for? INDUSTRY: (See REMARKS) D. What (do/did) they (make/do)? E. (Is/Was) (he/she) self-employed or (does/did) (he/she) work for someone else?

Values

  • 1 self-employed

  • 2 someone else

  • NA(d) don't know / NA(i) iap / NA(j) I don't have a job / NA(m) dk, na, iap / NA(n) no answer / NA(p) not imputable / NA(r) refused / NA(s) skipped on web / NA(u) uncodeable / NA(x) not available in this release / NA(y) not available in this year / NA(z) see codebook
